name: Winterlicious
description:
Love local with delicious meals at more than 240 restaurants, making Toronto a true food-lover's destination! 

With three-course prix fixe menus ranging from cozy favourites to vibrant global dishes, there's something for every taste and budget.

Lunch: $20 / $27 / $34 / $41 / $48 / $55

Dinner: $25 / $35 / $45 / $55 / $65 / $75
